name: Gallade
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

abilities.name: Premonition
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

attacks.name: Sensitive Blade
attacks.effect: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 70 more damage.
